conversation.speaker: Patient
conversation.text: I know I am too big, and I probably should exercise more and eat...my friends want to exercise with me. They’re lazier than I am.

conversation.speaker: Therapist
conversation.text: You have put a lot of effort into losing weight but it has not p...or you. You are looking for something different that might last.

conversation.speaker: Patient
conversation.text: I know I am too big, and I probably should exercise more and eat...my friends want to exercise with me. They’re lazier than I am.

conversation.speaker: Therapist
conversation.text: You don't know how you'd fit exercise into your schedule.

conversation.speaker: Therapist
conversation.text: Do you have a cheap gym near you, like a Planet Fitness?
